meanings.sent1: The website had a searchable database for users to explore.
meanings.sent2: The online library had a searchable catalog for easy access to books.
meanings.sent3: The searchable map made it simple to find nearby restaurants.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a searchable index, organized and ready for retrieval.
meanings.sent5: The treasure hunt became more exciting with a searchable map leading the way.

meanings.definition: Able to be found through a search.
meanings.sent1: The missing keys were searchable under the sofa cushions.
meanings.sent2: The relevant information was searchable within seconds on the internet.
meanings.sent3: The searchable clues in the mystery novel kept the readers engaged.
meanings.sent4: His talent was like a hidden gem, only searchable by those who truly knew him.
meanings.sent5: The searchable trail of breadcrumbs led them out of the forest safely.

meanings.sent1: The website was searchable with just a few clicks.
meanings.sent2: The app had a searchable feature that made navigation effortless.
meanings.sent3: The searchable menu made ordering food online a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a searchable database, open for exploration.
meanings.sent5: The searchable archive contained valuable historical documents.
